2.text: Rizwi received a letter from his pen friend Tony, last week. 1135, Green Drive, Los Angeles, California, USA. 93103. 22nd March 2016
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rizwi'>Rizwi</phoneme> received a letter from his pen friend Tony, last week. 1135, Green Drive, Los Angeles, California, USA. 93103. 22nd March 2016</prosody></speak>

4.text: Thank you very much for your letter. You had written in detail about your visit to the Nilaweli beach. I enjoyed reading it a lot. I wish I could visit your beautiful country some day.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Thank you very much for your letter. You had written in detail about your visit to the Nilaweli beach. I enjoyed reading it a lot. I wish I could visit your beautiful country some day.</prosody></speak>

5.text: Next week, I hope to go rock climbing with my friends. Do you also like rock climbing? I like it because it is exciting and adventurous, but it is a difficult and dangerous sport. However, it is important to concentrate on how to get to the top. When you are there, you feel that you can see the entire world and enjoy nature. Sometimes, I feel frightened, but it's a great experience. I have sent a photograph for you with the letter. Write to me about what you like to do during your free time.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Next week, I hope to go rock climbing with my friends. Do you also like rock climbing? I like it because it is exciting and adventurous, but it is a difficult and dangerous sport. However, it is important to concentrate on how to get to the top. When you are there, you feel that you can see the entire world and enjoy nature. Sometimes, I feel frightened, but it's a great experience. I have sent a photograph for you with the letter. Write to me about what you like to do during your free time.</prosody></speak>

6.text: I hope you and your family are keeping well.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>I hope you and your family are keeping well.</prosody></speak>

8.text: Write a letter to Tony, write about what you like to do in your free time.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Write a letter to Tony, write about what you like to do in your free time.</prosody></speak>
